Interface DiscordListener


  • public interface DiscordListener
    Used to listen for Discord Rich Presenceâ„¢ API events.
    Author:
    Trent "Whirvis" Summerlin

      • onDiscordInitialize

        default void onDiscordInitialize(DiscordPerson person)
        Called when the API has successfully initialized.
        Parameters:
        person - the Discord account associated with the API connection.

        errorCode - the error code.
        message - the message.

        Called when someone requests to join the current game.
        Parameters:
        person - the person requesting to join.

        Parameters:
        joinSecret - the join secret.
